name: Add sound interaction in your Figma prototype
description:
Add sound interactions in your Figma design.


Live demo


Follow these few easy steps and add sound interactions to your prototypes:


  1. Install Anima plugin
  2. Click on embed code
  3. Select the frame you want to embed the code to
  4. Select the Layer option in the plugin
  5. Paste your code (or copy from the example)
  6. Connect the link to your desired page
  7. Preview. voila!
